TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypedReference extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Describes objects that contain both a managed pointer to a location and a runtime representation of the type that may be stored at that location.

span.span: Describes objects that contain both a managed pointer to a location and a runtime representation of the type that may be stored at that location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uma referência de tipo é uma combinação de tipo/valor usada para varargs e outro suporte.A typed reference is a type/value combination used for varargs and other support. `TypedReference` é um tipo de valor interno que pode ser usado para parâmetros e variáveis locais.`TypedReference` is a built-in value type that can be used for parameters and local variables. Matrizes de `TypedReference` objetos não podem ser criados.Arrays of `TypedReference` objects cannot be created. Por exemplo, a chamada a seguir é inválida:For example, the following call is invalid: [!code-cpp[System.TypedReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.typedreference/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.TypedReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.typedreference/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TypedReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.typedreference/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static TypedReference MakeTypedReference (object target, System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] flds);

span.span: An object that contains the field described by the first element of flds.

param.name: flds
param.span: A list of field descriptions where each element describes a field that contains the field described by the succeeding element.

span.span: A list of field descriptions where each element describes a field that contains the field described by the succeeding element.

param.span: Each described field must be a value type.

span.span: Each described field must be a value type.

param.span: The field descriptions must be objects supplied by the type system.

span.span: The field descriptions must be objects supplied by the type system.

summary.span: Makes a for a field identified by a specified object and list of field descriptions.

span.span: Makes a for a field identified by a specified object and list of field descriptions.

returns.span: A for the field described by the last element of .

span.span: A for the field described by the last element of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método retorna uma referência de tipo para alguns campos de terminal, onde o `target` parâmetro contém o campo descrito no primeiro elemento do `flds`, o campo descrito pelo primeiro elemento da `flds` contém o campo descrito pelo elemento da segunda `flds`, e assim por diante, até que o campo de terminal seja atingido.The method returns a typed reference to some terminal field, where the `target` parameter contains the field described by the first element of `flds`, the field described by the first element of `flds` contains the field described by the second element of `flds`, and so on until the terminal field is reached. > [!NOTE] > Começando por [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], este método pode ser usado para acessar membros não públicos caso o chamador tenha recebido com o sinalizador e caso o conjunto de concessões dos membros não públicos esteja restrito ao conjunto de concessões do chamador ou um subconjunto dele.Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (Consulte [considerações de segurança para reflexão](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > Para usar essa funcionalidade, seu aplicativo deve ser direcionado ao [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] ou posterior.To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
